item.title: FIrst impressions of the MacBook Air 11"
item.description: Since Steve Jobs blessed my MacBook Air and I received it two day early, I've had almost a week to investigate the 11" MacBook Air. I opted to max it out, so it has 4GB of RAM, 128GB Solid State Drive (SSD) and the 1.6GHz Intel Core 2 Duo â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
